blog.name: solacednp
blog.title: stars aligned.
blog.description: [semi-hiatus] kian | main blog: journalingleaf

summary: when i really thinkg about it, this isn't that much of a suprise tbh? recently we had ii ending, dan vs phil ending, pinof...
body:
when i really thinkg about it, this isn’t that much of a suprise tbh? recently we had ii ending, dan vs phil ending, pinof reaching a big milestone and i just had the vibe of “we’re ready to move to a new era” and now it makes sense.

2018 was a big year in a lot of ways! their dynamic with us changed for the better and they became more confident with how they engage with us.

i’m excited to see how dnp develop their content and style in 2019. i’m so proud of seeing how far they’ve come and i can’t wait to see what’s next :’))

blog.name: zauberinb
blog.title: B.
blog.description: I’m a fangirl who happens to share her thoughts sometimes 💭✌🏼

summary: A letter to my lovely furrys☺️🖤
body:
A letter to my lovely furrys☺️🖤

‪I just watched @danielhowell and @AmazingPhil livestream and i had a few things I wanted to share…‬

‪I know you guys are not gonna see this post but I had the urge to share it with the Phandom☺️‬

I’m here since nearly tree years and you never failed to make me smile. You turned my sad moments into happiness!

I love your honesty and your goofyness and you guys just being you and staying grounded.

When PINOF 10 came out I think we all knew that this was the end but we rather chose not to believe it. When you uploaded the last Dan vs. Phil we were sad. But you have a good reason to “end” something because you have to move on and grow.

I was really sad about all the news when I heard about it first but I am actually more happy and excited for you because you reminded us that life goes on and that we have to experience new things and that we have to make new memories!☺️

So to conclude this incredibly messy and probably needless text, just don’t forget that every ending isn’t quiet an ending, it’s the beginning of a new chapter 🖤

So dear Dan and Phil I wish u all the love and the good things this life has yet to offer you! We love you💕

B.

summary: the thing that’s amazed me most about dnp for a few years (esp dan but phil more recently) is how dedicated they are to personal...
body: the thing that’s amazed me most about dnp for a few years (esp dan but phil more recently) is how dedicated they are to personal growth despite the truth of that bojack horseman quote about how adoring fans (and adoring partners) almost always hinder or even halt that growth because you stop being challenged. dnp could have easily just churned out the same content they were making in 2015 or even 2012/2010 because, well, people loved it, and loved them. but they didn’t. they’ve both come so far, phils confidence, dans happiness and self love. and best of all they took all of us who were struggling with those thing with them. not to be totally cheesy but they really are some of the best role models i’ve ever had and i couldn’t be happier for them or more proud 💖

summary: I only watched the last 15 minutes and that was mass choas wtf. I'm a bit lost still and sad tbh. I'm sad that the old stuff is...
body: I only watched the last 15 minutes and that was mass choas wtf. I’m a bit lost still and sad tbh. I’m sad that the old stuff is ending but this means there’s new beginnings. I have no idea what that means and it’s a bit terrifying, but change always is. I just want them to be happy, even if it’s a lot for us to handle. They’ve given us so much and they deserve everything and more in return. Ugh. I’m still kinda scared and ik a lot of people are, but they aren’t going anywhere. 2019 is gonna be wild y'all so strap yourselves in!!

blog.name: sketchoddity
blog.title: Asteroid Angel is Writing the Sky
blog.description:
IM A FANFIC AUTHOR, HERE’S MY:

WATTPAD:

https://my.w.tt/bEXCnhC1WO

AO3:

https://archiveofourown.org/users/anauthorsoddity/

summary: okay y’all seem to be like dying right now so let me get deep for a sec instead of posting some cringey relatable joke about a...
body:
okay y’all seem to be like dying right now so let me get deep for a sec instead of posting some cringey relatable joke about a liveshow that i missed.

dan and phil are adults, they are human. just like you and me, they grow in and out of things. ending pinof, going on hiatus from dapg for their benefit to be more creative and for the holidays, is normal. it’s okay. they’re not feuding, they specifically said they aren’t going anywhere, they are best friends, soulmates even, and they are just fine. it’s not the end of the world and when things change, yeah we get scared but the fact of the matter is that they’re not 22 anymore. they’ve grown just like you have since 2014, and yeah we’ll get used to this. yes, it’s sad but we can make new memories. we get to see them grow more as they’ve escaped the shell of their past we have confined them into.

2019 is going to be their year. it’ll be a year of change but one for the better, and yeah old habits die hard but i have a feeling we are in for one of the best years of dan and phil we’ve ever seen.

TL:DR: they’re growing, functioning human beings. it’s all okay, and the world isn’t ending. they aren’t going anywhere, and they also don’t want us to worry.
